## WorkspaceSvg.getGrid() method

Get the grid object for this workspace, or null if there is none.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getGrid(): Grid | null;
```
**Returns:**

[Grid](./blockly.grid.md) \| null

The grid object for this workspace.
